text: John Uhler "Jack" Lemmon III (February 8, 1925 â€“ June 27, 2001), was an American actor and director who received many awards in his long career. He got two Academy and five Golden Globe awards. Lemmon acted in many movies, and was famous for being very good at comedy and drama. Lemmon died of bladder and colon cancer. == Movies == *The Lady Takes a Sailor (1949) *It Should Happen to You (1954) *Phffft!
